title: [Valley of Gold, Elven Clearing]
description: Brightly hued ribbons wind up and down the massive oak tree trunks that encircle the clearing.  Some carved wooden benches are arranged about the area, their surfaces carved with a variety of blooming flowers.  Colorful crystal lanterns hang from varnished poles wrapped with vibrant silk.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
